lead_paragraph: Arsenal goalkeeper Petr Cech has given an insight to the multinational shape of the modern Premier League by revealing he speaks to his defenders during matches in three languages.

headline.print_headline: Arsenal's Cech Calls the Shots in Any Language
headline.main: Arsenal's Cech Calls the Shots in Any Language

snippet: Arsenal goalkeeper Petr Cech has given an insight to the multinational shape of the modern Premier League by revealing he speaks to his defenders during matches in three languages....
